title: Account issues
body: My account was wiped of all my progress and asked me to create another username and start over again. I had made alot of progress on my account before I took a break from league for school reasons. Is there anyway I can get it back? My ingame name before was TheGuardianToast. Thank you. You can see one of my posts if you search my previous ingame name before the board synced or look at it here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Imd02j3T-returning-on-an-old-account-everything-gone

replies.body: We don't delete accounts for inactivity, but there's a chance you might be trying to access your account in the wrong region or username.  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can work with you directly and locate your account.  See you there!
I am having trouble because I do not know where I can verify The CAPTCHA. If you can tell me where it is that would be good. Thanks.
